title: Greek Yogurt & Berry Parfait
steps: Layer half the yogurt in a glass.
Add half the berries, then a sprinkle of granola.
Repeat layers and finish with honey and mint.
Serve immediately.

title: Spinach & Feta Omelette
steps: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Sauté spinach in oil until wilted.
Pour eggs over spinach, sprinkle feta, cook until set and fold.
Slide onto plate and serve warm.

title: Avocado Toast with Lemon & Chili
steps: Mash avocado with lemon, salt, and pepper.
Spread over toast and sprinkle chili flakes.
Serve immediately.

title: Mediterranean Tuna Salad Wrap
steps: Mix tuna with cucumber, olives, feta, oil, and lemon.
Place lettuce on wrap, add tuna mix, roll up.
Cut in half and serve.

title: Chickpea & Avocado Salad Bowl
steps: Combine chickpeas, avocado, onion, and tomatoes in a bowl.
Whisk oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper; toss with salad.
Garnish with parsley and serve chilled or room temperature.

title: Garlic Shrimp & Lemon Orzo
steps: Cook orzo according to package; drain and set aside.
Sauté garlic in oil, add shrimp and cook until pink.
Toss orzo with shrimp, lemon zest/juice, parsley, and seasonings.
Serve warm.

title: 15-Minute Stir-Fry Veggie Noodles
ingredients: chopped green onions and sesame seeds
steps: Soak or cook noodles as package directs and drain.
Stir-fry veggies with garlic in sesame oil until tender-crisp.
Add noodles and soy sauce; toss until heated through.
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds and serve.

title: Chicken Piccata with Lemon-Caper Sauce
steps: Lightly coat chicken in flour and season.
Sear chicken in oil+butter until cooked and set aside.
Add broth, lemon juice, and capers to pan, reduce slightly.
Return chicken to pan, spoon sauce over and serve.

title: One-Pan Pesto Salmon & Green Beans
steps: Toss green beans with olive oil, salt, pepper and arrange on baking sheet.
Place salmon beside beans, spread pesto on top of fillets.
Roast at 200°C (400°F) for 12-15 minutes until salmon is cooked.
Serve with lemon wedges.

title: No-Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Cups
steps: Melt chocolate with coconut oil in a double boiler or microwave.
Spoon a layer of chocolate into lined muffin cups, chill 5 minutes.
Add a dollop of peanut butter, top with more chocolate and a pinch of salt.
Chill until set and enjoy.

title: Greek Yogurt Lemon Parfait
ingredients: 2 tbsp lemon curd or lemon curd substitute
2 tbsp crushed digestive biscuits or granola
steps: Layer yogurt, lemon curd, and crushed biscuits in serving glasses.
Top with lemon zest and serve chilled.

title: Grilled Peaches with Honey & Ricotta
steps: Brush peach halves with a little oil and grill cut-side down 3-4 minutes.
Top each half with ricotta and a drizzle of honey.
Garnish with basil and serve warm.
